#Text=Wikinews interviews Brittany
#Text=Phelps , administrator of the United
#Text=States Pirate Party
#Text=Monday , May 3 , 2010
#Text=Wikinews reporter
#Text=Peter Coti interviews Brittany Phelps , administrator of the United States Pirate Party , who talks about her job and her goals .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Unites States Pirate Party Logo
#Text=( ( Peter Coti ) ) Who are you and what do you do ?
#Text=( ( Brittany Phelps ) ) For the past three months , I 've been the administrator of the United States Pirate Party .
#Text=In general , I direct and oversee the activities of the USPP .
#Text=At the moment , my most challenging task is to cultivate state parties across the US .
#Text=Without them , the national party is essentially insolvent .
#Text=( ( PC ) ) What is the Pirate Party ?
#Text=( ( BP ) ) The United States
#Text=Pirate Party is a relatively new party in the U.S. , currently undergoing a revival after having been founded a few years ago .
#Text=We are similar in nature to the various Pirate Parties found internationally , though we differ somewhat in platform and formation .
#Text=( ( PC ) ) What are the goals of the Pirate Party ?
#Text=( ( BP ) ) We are dedicated to protecting Americans ' rights to privacy , freedom of information , reforming the patent and copyright systems , and ensuring government transparency .
#Text=( ( PC ) ) What are some things you personally want to change about the government ?

#Text=( ( BP ) ) There are a great many things I could bring up in regards to changing in the government , so I 'll keep it to my three greatest concerns : Transparency , privacy , and ballot reform .
#Text=Firstly , transparency is required from our government in all but the most dire situations .
#Text=President Obama seemed , at first , to be promising in this regard , but again and again since he took office , he has proven that hope to be ill-placed .

#Text=ACTA is hidden from FOIA requests , more light is not shed about torture techniques , and numerous bills , most memorably the recent health care reform , are not brought to light for the promised number of days -- how is this transparency ?
#Text=My second qualm , privacy , is boiled down very simply -- as technology grows , so does the ability to invade the privacy of citizens for the sake of a potential safeguard .
#Text=This route is far from affective [ sic ] in its proposed function .
#Text=We should take the time to find more effective ways to reduce crime without invading the privacy of law-abiding citizens .
#Text=Not doing so is to treat each and every American as a criminal without a trial .
#Text=And , thirdly , ballot access .
#Text=While not necessarily a plank of our platform , it is a challenge that the USPP will have to face early on .
#Text=There is a long standing idea that the United States has two political parties , and that 's it , end of story .
#Text=I ca n't help but wonder of these people -- do you think that the country was founded between these two parties alone ?
#Text=We are a nation of many people , with many ideas and many opinions .
#Text=To try and simply this to a black and white dichotomy does a disservice to the nation and its people .
#Text=There are shades of gray .
#Text=( ( PC ) ) How did you get involved with the party ?
#Text=( ( BP ) ) I got involved last fall after hearing of the success of our European counterparts in their elections .
#Text=I was certain that someone had started a Pirate Party in the U.S. , but was surprised that I had n't heard about it already , so I went looking .
#Text=And here I am .
#Text=( ( PC ) ) Do you think you have a chance against other parties ?
#Text=( ( BP ) ) I have no disillusions about it being difficult , but I am convinced that we have the capability to do so , yes .
#Text=Furthermore , I welcome the challenge .
#Text=( ( PC ) ) If you could change anything right this second about the government what would it be ?
#Text=( ( BP ) ) I think if I had the opportunity to change anything , it would be one of the three that I covered in question 4 .
#Text=I 'm inclined to say ballot access , considering the immediate impact it would have for the USPP and other smaller parties , but transparency and privacy would be close contenders .
#Text=( ( PC ) ) Could you take this test , and let us know where you stand on the political spectrum ?
#Text=( ( BP ) ) After taking the test , I got a 60%/40 % , which put me just inside the zone for a " Centrist " .
#Text=Sounds about right .
#Text=( ( PC ) ) Anything else you want to add ?

#Text=( ( BP ) ) Just today we launched a new website , as part of our effort to restart the movement in the United States , so I invite all who read this to waltz on over to our website and take a look . Thanks for reading !
